sub_title: Project manager | Japanese textile culture researcher.
summary:
I am an experienced project manager and researcher with a passion for art and textile technology. I have a Bachelor of Arts from The National Academy of Fine Arts and Architecture, a Master’s degree in Textile Technology from Kyiv National University of Technologies and Design, and a Project Management for Creative Teams certificate from Kyiv-Mohyla Business School. My professional experience includes leading B2B clients, organizing business events, managing culture & administration for pop-up locations, researching prototypes of temporary use projects, founding & owning KimonoUA - Ukrainian kimono club. During my career I have attracted 50+ clients with an average annual budget of 7000 euros, organized more than 30 business events within the country and abroad (Montenegro, Georgia, Turkey, Egypt), and published the book “88 Japanese Kimono Patterns” which was presented at the Book Arsenal International Festival. I also provided lectures about Japanese kimonos and Japanese textile culture to 400 people. I am open to new projects and jobs in the art industry that will help me to continue exploring my passion for art and textile technology.
0/2,600
2600 maximum characters allowed.

company.name: KimonoUA, Ukrainian kimono club and online store

profile_positions.company: KimonoUA, Ukrainian kimono club and online store
profile_positions.description: KimonoUA developed from a passion for Japanese kimonos, which emerged as a combination of studies in art and textile technology. - Planning and executing business strategy, sales, customer support, SMM (5000 fans in Instagram, 1200 fans in Facebook) - Search for general vendors, buying unique kimono lots at Japanese auctions, and organizing global delivery to clients - Providing lectures about Japanese kimonos and Japanese textile culture with over 400+ event attendees - Selling over 600 kimonos in total Research results of Japanese patterns were published in the form of a book "88 Japanese Kimono Patterns" in 2021 and presented at the Book Arsenal International Festival. For now 1000 books have been sold.
profile_positions.title: Founder and Owner

company.name: Business Award for brands Choice of the Year Ukraine

profile_positions.company: Business Award for brands Choice of the Year Ukraine
profile_positions.description: I led B2B clients and the search for new clients (cold calls, sending offers to contacts from open sources, networking\). Worked in the categories of beverages, skincare & makeup, household cleaning products, household appliances, OTC medicine and others). Among my clients were Samsung, J&J, Unilever, Henkel, PepsiCo, Dior, Nivea. - Won 50+ global-brand B2B clients for the company in the categories of beverages, skincare & makeup, household cleaning products, household appliances, OTC medicine - Managed annual brand market research by TNS Kantar (300+ participants) and research audit by Deloitte - Organized more than 30 business events (Ukraine,Montenegro, Georgia, Turkey, Egypt), ranging from 20 to 8000 participants - Researched and managed event vendors (technical support, accommodation, logistics, decoration) Sold and provided custom event sponsorship packages to B2B clients (promo-stands, videos, sampling, banners etc.)
profile_positions.title: B2B Client manager & Event Manager
